scenes.text:
The Feminist Society welcomes members of all genders who believe in and advocate for gender equality. We utilise our Instagram to advertise upcoming events, protests and some suggested readings.

We aim to be as intersectional as possible, considering feminism in relation to race, social class, disability and LGBTQ+ issues.
We don't have a specific day, but specific date and times for socials we run can be found on our SU page and our social media.
Our membership is Â£6.00 for the year!
We hold regular, casual meetings that provide a safe space to discuss  our own experiences of the patriarchy, as well as doing fun activities like coffee mornings, trips and alcohol-based socials.
